main event: A family in Waikiki Beach reported bright lights moving across the sky with changes in color from red to blue on 3 August 1965.
interesting points: The lights were very bright and illuminated the Waikiki area., Numerous sightings of bright lights falling into the ocean were reported southwest of Oahu., One object was said to have descended at a rapid 180 degrees per second., A T-33 jet crew witnessed a bright light pass directly overhead and was likely linked to an Atlas missile launch., A teenager reported a bright light in the sky on 5 August but this was deemed non-significant.
witness description: a family living in Waikiki Beach
